alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 14 at 1:45PM MST until December 15 at 8:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...SNOWY AND WINDY CONDITIONS WEDNESDAY... .Gusty winds and locally high snowfall rates will combine to produce difficult travel conditions tomorrow afternoon over portions of southwestern South Dakota. Falling and blowing snow will lead to reduced visibility and slippery road conditions. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Locally higher amounts possible. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Oglala Lakota County and Bennett County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Pine Ridge Reservation. * WHEN...From noon to 8 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Localized snowfall rates of half an inch to an inch per hour are expected for a brief period of time tomorrow afternoon within a band of snow. Although the strongest winds tomorrow will likely not occur at the same time as the heaviest snowfall, the combination of blowing and falling snow could lead to difficult travel conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.
